About this visualization

This interactive network shows hip-hop artists and their collaborations.

How to use
• Search for an artist by name
• Click a node to open the information pane
• Use the zoom controls to navigate

Visual encodings
• Node size: centrality (more connected artists appear larger)
• Node color: community / cluster (modularity)

Built in R and exported to Gephi using the Sigma.js web export.
text.intro: An interactive network of hip-hop artists and collaborations. Nodes represent artists and edges represent collaborations. Use Search to find an artist, and Group Selector to highlight communities.
text.title: Hip-hop Collaboration Network
